page.title: 05A DAY AT BORDON GARRISON
page.content: At 7.30 AM there is a muster parade for those who are taking proficiency courses. At 8.00 AM there is recruit muster parade. This is followed by a drill until 10.00 AM. There is a break until 10.30. From 10.30 until 12 n00n the recruits are at the firing ranges. Lunch is from 12 to 12.30. At 12.30 the permanent staff are briefed and at 1.00 PM the recruits start fieldcraft. There is a break from from 3.00 to 3.15 PM.At 3.15 PM recruits learn First Aid. Then at 5.00 PM there is tea until 6.00 PM. AT 6.00 PM those who are taking trade courses study and the recruits work until 9.00 PM doing their kit and preparing rooms for inspection. Some study for exams.The recruits work long hard days but they are only here for two weeks.
